author: Staff Reporter
text:
The city police are inquiring into the alleged robbery in which unidentified persons sprayed chilly power on the face of two workers and took away 65 kg of silver items from them here on Wednesday night.

Gobi of Shevapet who was running a silver anklet manufacturing unit used to purchase silver bars in bulk from a shop at Eswaran Kovil Street.

On Wednesday, Ajmeer Kahn (25) and Ramalingam (45), both workers, were sent to get the silver bars.

Both received 65 kg silver bars from the seller and were on their way to the unit.

Two unidentified persons followed them and sprayed chilly powder on the face of Ajmeer Khan, who was on the wheels.

He lost control and both along with their vehicle fell down on the road. Immediately, unidentified persons took away the 65 kg silver bars and fled.

Investigation

They informed Gobi who rushed to the spot.

The police are investigating.
title: Police inquiring into alleged robbery of silver items
